name: Can't Stop Won't Stop
description: The duration of the Attacker's Unstoppable effects are increased by {0}, however the Defender takes {1} less Damage unless the Attacker is Unstoppable.

name: Chitinous Thorns
description: If the Defender has an Armor Up Buff, the Attacker is inflicted with a Bleed Debuff causing {0} of the Defender's Attack over {1} seconds, each time Contact is made.

name: Colorblind
description: For each champion of the same class on the Attacker's team, they suffer a Degeneration of {0} of their max health over 15 seconds at the start of the fight.

name: Cosmic Fracture
description: Cosmic Attacker's Light Attacks have a 50% chance to Armor Break the Defender, reducing their Armor Rating by 40% for 7 second(s). If the Light Hit was Critical, the chance is 100% instead.

name: Cutting Wires
description: Whenever a Robotic Attacker would gain a Bleed Debuff, they instead gain a Shock Debuff dealing {0} of the Defender's Attack Rating as Direct Damage over 5 seconds.

name: Double Down
description: Whenever a Skill Attacker fails to apply a Debuff to the Defender due to an Immunity, they gain a Precision Buff increasing Critical Rating by +1,433 for 10 second(s).

name: Flare
description: The Opponent gains {0} Attack, but takes {1} of their Max Health as Direct Damage over 60 seconds. The strength of the Damage is affected by Class Relationships.

name: Got A Light?
description: Both the Attacker and Defender's strikes have a {0} chance to apply an Incinerate Debuff, dealing {1} of Attack as Energy Damage over {2} seconds.

name: Invade
description: Both Champions have 100% Block Penetration and 300% increased Attack when hitting a Block.

name: Kinetic Instigator
description: The Opponent generates Power when striking this Champion's Block.

name: Masochism
description: Every 7 seconds the next Debuff triggered on this Champion is immediately removed. Each time this effect trriggers they Regenerate {0} of their Max Health.

name: Mighty Charge
description: When performing a Medium dash attack the Defender Purifies all active Debuffs and becomess immune to future Debuffs until the dash ends. Any Debuffs remaining after the Purify are removed when the Immunity activates.

name: Oscillate
description: Every 15 seconds, the Defender alternates between a Fury passive increasing Base Attack by 100% and an Armor Up/Crit Resistance passive increasing Armor and Crit Resist by 500. These Passives are unaffected by Ability Accuracy modification.

name: Pleasure to Burn
description: Incinerate Debuffs and Passives deal {0} more damage to the Defender, and they take {1} less damage from all sources unless they are inflicted with an Incinerate Debuff or Passive.

name: Power Focus
description: The Defender gains {0} Combat Power Rate while below 2 Bars of Power, but suffers {1} Combat Power Rate while above.

name: Turtling
description:
If the Attacker hasn't landed a hit in 6 seconds the Defenderr gains an indefinite Armor Up Buff, increasing their Armor Rating by {0}, with a max of 3 stacks.
Landing a hit resets the timer.

name: Muscle Wizard
description: Whenever a Mystic Attacker knocks down the Defender, the Attacker has a 100% chance to gain an Unstoppable Buff for 6 second(s). If the Attacker was already Unstoppable, they instead gain an indefinite Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 50%. A maximum of 4 Fury Buffs can be gained this way.
